term.title: acidosis

item.text: Pathological condition in which the hydrogen ion substance concentration of body fluids is above normal and hence the pH of blood falls below the reference interval.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2009 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
